item.title: Bias Variance Trade-off
item.description: When it comes to the 𝗯𝗶𝗮𝘀-𝘃𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗱𝗲𝗼𝗳𝗳 and 𝗶𝘁𝘀 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝘂𝗻𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗶𝗻 𝗺𝗮𝗰𝗵𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻𝗶𝗻𝗴, I sometimes need a few seconds to fully connect the dots in my mind. 🔄🧠 Has this ever happened to you? 🤔 If your answer is yes, let me share you how I see it and help myself. I always try to relate these concepts to real-life examples. I hope this approach benefits you too. 💡
